# DC_Trees

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of DC_Trees is to seamlessly combine data on the trees and people of Washington D.C. to explore the relationships between population and tree density. 

## Installation

The development version of DC_Trees is available from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Reed-Math241/pkgGrpt")
```

```{r example}
library(DC_Tree_Pop_sf)
```
